reviewText: This is exactly what my Mom wanted. This being the last season of Monk she wanted to collect them all before they become hard to find.
Favorite show. Probably have a biased opinion
If you like the Monk Series, then this continues to entertain. We have watched all seasons, but I can't say I have a favorite.  Good for humor.

Good service.  Came in time for Christmas.  Given as a gift to son.

Like the vendor.

I was unable to get this, and lost my money.  I used a one-time debit card, and destroyed it before I learned that I could not get the item.  The first shipment was the wrong item, and it took 15 days to notify me that the correct one was not available.  By that time the card had been destroyed since there was no money on it.  I'm out $40.
I am hooked on Monk.  Haven't seen season one yet but it is on order.  Monk is so much fun to watch because you never know how he is going to solve the case.
This is part of a great series. I really enjoy seeing it! It arrived in a timely manner. Thank you.
I miss the intellegence of the writing and the capability of Tony Shaloub. Reruns are great - but we need something new.

the item arrived quickly and i love it. thank you very much. i recommend this item and seller to anybody.
great item.
  Arie and Sandy.
Monk is a great and surprisingly relatable show.  I love that they sell the seasons in 2 packs for the price of a single season
Since I love MONK I have to rate it Highly.  Also It was shipped in a timely manner and arrived in good time.  It was well packed for shipping.
